Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

Since there was an increase in bugdet, I increased the speed and resilience of the system by adding infrastructure to another region EU Ireland. This is totally seperate with vpcs and database Multi-AZ read replicas. If there is a total region failure in the US East, our infratructure will continue to work smoothly and one of  the read replicas can be promoted to the master.
For the serverless infrastructure, I added DynamoDB streams and a backup in EU Ireland.
